altTitles.en: Dead Rock

altTitles.ja: デッドロック

description.en:
The latest series by Hiro Mashima is a Demon World Academy Dark Fantasy!!
DEAD ROCK is a demon king training institution that towers over the depths of the demon world.
Yakuto, a young demon, challenges the harsh entrance exam to knock on the doors of DEAD ROCK!!
description.fr: DEAD ROCK se déroule au sein de l'académie sombre et fantastique du même nom, un institut d'entraînement pour les rois démons qui gouvernent les abysses du monde des démons. C'est là que Yakuto, un jeune résident du monde des démons, se lance dans le défi des examens d'admission.
description.ja:
デッドロック、それは魔界の深層にそびえたつ魔王養成機関。
魔界人の若者であるヤクトは、デッドロックの門戸をたたくため、過酷な入学試験に挑む!!

altTitles.ja-ro: Captain Tsubasa Memories ~Kore wa Nankatsu Shō vs Shūtetsu Shō Taikōsen Tōjitsu ni Okotta Hanashi~

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼 MEMORIES

altTitles.en: Oozora's family moving out
I'm Wakabayashi Genzo, birth of the SGGK
The legend of the strongest Meiwa FC

description.en: A collection of the "Captain Tsubasa Memories" one-shot series.

altTitles.ja: ブルースカイコンプレックス

description.ca: En Narazaki és un alumne seriós que li agrada llegir i es deixa portar força per la vida. En Terashima és un delinqüent que es baralla tot sovint. En Narazaki acaba fent de supervisor d'en Terashima quan aquest ha de fer hores de bon comportament a la biblioteca de l'insti. Sense dir-se ni mu, en Narazaki va agafant interès pel misteriós Terashima, que, per la seva banda, té una opinió molt ben formada d'en Narazaki…
description.en:
Narasaki only wanted a place where he could sit and read books in peace, but was blackmailed by his teacher into supervising a delinquent called Terashima while working at the school library.  
  
As they spend their days in silent but close proximity, they begin to feel drawn to each other. And then…  


---
description.pl: Narasaki jest porządnym uczniem, który z powodu pewnego zdarzenia zostaje wrobiony w odgrywanie roli bibliotekarza. Wszystko byłoby dobrze, gdyby to było jego jedyne zadanie… Musi on jednak mieć na oku pewnego delikwenta, który odsiaduje tam swoją karę. Jak to się potoczy?

description.en:
The cute and funny adventures of a boy and his best friend.  
  
Note: The story starts at chapter 42. The earlier chapters contain insert art of the characters by the author.
description.pl: Opowieść o przygodach czwórki przyjaciół. Zbieżność w numeracji rozdziałów wynika z zastosowania odmiennego niż angielska grupa systemu liczbowania dodatków – tłumaczenia są mniej więcej na tym samym etapie.
description.zh: 幼儿园里的一次合影是见一、展正希一辈子情谊的起点。一起长大的发小在校园里又遇见了贺天、莫关山这些好朋友。《19天》不仅仅是四人轻松愉快的校园日常，也是男孩们相互理解帮助最终成长的青春物语。

title.en: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Mysteries Journal
The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ru: Монолог в аптечной лавке - Журнал тайн внутреннего дворца Маомао

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

title.en: I Don't Want to Attack You!

description.en:
On the way home, a drunk Heather helps an elephant who is crying because his nose hurts. When a small, palm-sized elephant is turned into a nose cuff, the elephant claims to be the god of sexual desire and affection.

"In exchange, I will let you share passionate love with the most handsome man on the continent."

However, this was not a blessing from God, but a curse.
description.pt-br:
No caminho para casa, Heather bêbada ajuda um elefante que está chorando porque seu nariz dói. Quando um pequeno elefante do tamanho da palma da mão é transformado em uma algema para o nariz, o elefante afirma ser o deus do desejo sexual e do afeto.

“Em troca, deixarei você compartilhar um amor apaixonado com o homem mais bonito do continente.”

No entanto, isso não foi uma bênção de Deus, mas uma maldição.

title.en: I Look Too Much Like The Boss And The World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance is so BOSS-like, Yet Everyone Believes it

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.en: The Female Lead Has an Affair With My Fiancé
The Heroine Had an Affair With My Fiancé

description.en:
She became an extra who died because of her rubbish fiancé. She succeeded in becoming best friends with the heroine in order to twist the original plot.

"I'm sorry, Ciel. But we're still friends, right?"

The heroine had an affair with my fiancé. Yeah, go ahead and take that trash.

"Would you like to have a revenge affair with someone who's been the victim of an affair, Your Highness?"

'Cause I decided to have the Male Lead. Since I've broken my engagement, I can start getting the Male Lead after getting out of the original story and decided to enjoy a happy life. After a while, rumors have spread that I was the Crown's Prince lover and was raking in money. And there's also the news that the two had broken up.

"Ciel, I was wrong. Can we still be friends?"

"Ciel… I was foolish. You are the only one that I love. You love me too, right? So let's start over."

What? Are they both out of their minds? Throwing their hands away, I raised the corners of my lips.

"Don't make me laugh. Get out of here."

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

title.en: I Guess I Became the Mother of the Great Demon King's 10 Children in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Saikyo Mao no Kodomo-tachi 10-nin no Mama ni Nacchaimashita.

altTitles.ru: Я стала мамой десяти детей сильнейшего демона в другом мире

altTitles.zh-hk: 一不小心在異世界當上了最強魔王的十個孩子的媽媽.

altTitles.ja: 異世界で最強魔王の子供達10人のママになっちゃいました。

altTitles.fr: Le Roi-Démon et moi, et nos 10 enfants

altTitles.th: ชีวิตใหม่ในโลกต่างมิติของฉันถูกลิขิตให้เลี้ยงลูกจอมมารทั้ง 10

altTitles.zh: 一不小心在异世界当上了最强魔王的十个孩子的妈妈

description.en: High school girl Akari mourns the loss of her mother who died when she shielded Akari from an oncoming truck a year ago. She discovers an adventure game her mother had gotten for her birthday some time ago, but never had a chance to finish. Suddenly, she is summoned to be the mother of the Demon Lord's 10 children in another world…

altTitles.en: Daily Chaldea

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Strongest Lv1 Support in the World

description.en: “Even if I can only use primary healing skill, I still want to become the strongest!” The LV1 healer boy and the weakest God’s chosen girl started their journey with the goal of becoming the strongest. However, the Young man did not expect that this time would be his last journey.
description.id: “Bahkan jika aku hanya bisa menggunakan teknik penyembuhan dasar, aku ingin menjadi yang terkuat!” Seorang bocah healer level 1 dan gadis pilihan dewa terlemah memulai perjalanan mereka dengan tujuan menjadi yang terkuat.  Namun, pemuda itu tidak menyangka bahwa kali ini akan menjadi perjalanan terakhirnya.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

altTitles.en: Matchmaking of the Amagami Household

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.

description.fr: Après la chute de la troisième lune au centre de la ville, des personnes dotées de superpouvoirs sont apparues, que l'on a commencé à appeler des "phénomènes". C'est l'histoire d'une armée de résistance qui vit sur la lune et utilise ouvertement ses capacités, et des phénomènes du gouvernement qui protègent le bien des habitants de la ville en empêchant les attaques depuis la lune.

title.en: Josou Danshi wa Skirt wo Nugitai!

altTitles.ja: 女装男子はスカートを脱ぎたい！

altTitles.en: The Crossdressing Boy Wants to Take Off His Skirt

description.en: Uichiro, a junior high school boy, harbors a secret he cannot share with his childhood friend, Tama-chan. He has been cross-dressing for her because she has a phobia of men. This is a thrilling yet agonizing comedy about a boy who cross-dresses for the girl he loves!
description.ja:
男子中学生の宇一郎には、幼馴染のたまちゃんに言えないある秘密があった。
それは男性恐怖症である彼女のために「女の子を演じている」ということ。
想いを寄せる少女のために女装を続ける年頃男子のドキドキ悶絶コメディ！！

altTitles.en: Goodbye, My King
The King and Me
See You, My King

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

altTitles.ja: 押忍！！空手部

description.en:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.

title.en: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 男子高校生だけどギャルにTSしました

altTitles.en: I’m a High School Boy, but I Got Gender-Swapped Into a Gyaru

altTitles.ja-ro: Danshi Koukousei Dakedo Gal ni TS Shimashita

description.en:
Shunpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! 
Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.

It's the beginning of an introverted high school guy => gender-swapped gyaru comedy!

---
- [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
description.ja:
陰キャ男子・桜井は、目の前で溺れていたギャル神様を助けた恩恵でギャルになってしまった。
母親の伝手で転校することができたが、その学校はギャルだらけの女子校だった！
ギャルどころか女子とまともに交流したことがない桜井にとって刺激が強すぎる毎日…。
陰キャ男子高校生⇒ギャルTSコメディ開幕！！

description.en:
"You’re the first one… that can feel my presence…"
"What the… You look cute even though it's just a dream…"
Under the influence of his shaman father, Jinhyuk has the ability to sense non-human entities. Furthermore, the fairy who is in love with Jinhyuk hangs around him, pulls pranks on him, and, with the help of a succubus, enters his dreams. With his pure intentions, the fairy thought, "I will only meet him once." Instead, the brief meeting made his affections for him become stronger. Every night, Jinhyuk has a dream in which the fairy appears; unlike the ghosts he had seen as a child, the fairy appears to be harmless. What starts as pure curiosity turns into a flirtatious encounter, and the two are drawn into a sweet, creamy dream… 
A dream as fresh as milk and as sweet as cream!
description.fr:
"Tu es le premier ... à pouvoir sentir ma présence ... !"
"Qu'est-ce que ... Tu es mignon même si ce n'est qu'un rêve ... "
Grâce à son père chaman, Jinhyuk peut sentir la présence de créatures non-humaines.
Une fée ayant eu le coup de foudre après sa rencontre avec Jinhyuk, lui tourne autour et lui fait des farces, et avec l'aide d'une succube, entre dans les rêves de Jinhyuk.
Avec ses intentions pures, la fée pensait : "J'aimerais le rencontrer juste une fois ! », mais au lieu de cela, cette brève rencontre n'a fait que renforcer ses sentiments pour lui. Chaque nuit, la fée lui rend visite dans ses rêves. Contrairement aux fantômes qu'il avait croisés étant plus jeune, la fée semblait inoffensive. Et même mignonne comparée aux fantômes de son enfance.
Ce qui n'était au départ qu'une simple curiosité s'est transformé en une séduisante rencontre, où tous deux sont entraînés dans un rêve doux et crémeux ...
Un rêve aussi frais que le lait et aussi doux que la crème !

description.en:
Entertainment writer Lee Seul, heard the news of her favorite idol, Block Shoot's Seung-Chan, on her new entertainment program.
Expectations of meeting her favorite for more than 10 years are brief, and she accidentally sees her favorite idol kissing someone else in secret at the broadcasting station.
In addition, the entertainment program she was in charge of is a love variety program that’s full of dating amongst the cast...
She has to watch her favorite idol flirting and dating someone else even if he's her favorite.

"The deadline is six months, within which you must kill your husband."

On the first night of their marriage, I possessed the body of 'Alice,' a villainous supporting character who was ordered by her mother-in-law to kill her husband.

I thought I was married off to a duke who's a living  corpse for the sake of money, but lo and behold, this duke has a great body and is handsome as well. Instead of killing him, I looked for a way to survive by using divine power instead of poison.

"Mother, I will become a priestess for the duke!
As a priestess, I shall pray for the duke's well-being for the rest of my life!"

On the day I was about to leave the duke's mansion, my husband who had been unconscious suddenly woke up.

"You're the one who brought me out of the darkness, so take responsibility."

He wakes up and demands I take responsibility after saving him?

altTitles.en: The Apothecary Diaries

altTitles.de: Die Tagebücher der Apothekerin - Geheimnisse am Kaiserhof

altTitles.th: สืบคดีปริศนา หมอยาตำรับโคมแดง เล่ม

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと

description.de: Maomao ist eine unscheinbare Dienerin am Kaiserlichen kaiserlichen Hof. Zumindest bemüht sie sich, so gesehen zu werden. Denn seit sie in den Dienst des Kaisers verkauft wurde, hat die junge Apothekerin alles darangesetzt, ihre Schuld abzuarbeiten, ohne weiteres Aufsehen zu erregen, damit sie bald nach Hause zurückkehren kann. Aber Maomao ist schlau – und viel zu neugierig. Als die Kronprinzen einer nach dem anderen einem mysteriösen „Fluch“ erliegen, mischt sie sich heimlich ein, um das Rätsel zu lösen. Dabei erregt sie die Aufmerksamkeit des Eunuchen Jinshi – und eh sie sichs versieht, wird sie mitten in die Intrigen am Kaiserhof hineingezogen…
description.en: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
description.fr:
À 17 ans, Mao Mao a une vie compliquée. Formée dès son jeune âge par un apothicaire du quartier des plaisirs, elle se retrouve enlevée et vendue comme servante dans le quartier des femmes du palais impérial! Entouré de hauts murs, il est coupé du monde extérieur. Afin de survivre dans cette prison de luxe grouillant de complots et de basses manœuvres, la jeune fille tente de cacher ses connaissances pour se fondre dans la masse.

Mais, quand les morts suspectes de princes nouveau-nés mettent la cour en émoi, sa passion pour les poisons prend le dessus. Elle observe, enquête… et trouve la solution! En voulant bien faire, la voilà repérée… Jinshi, haut fonctionnaire aussi beau que calculateur, devine son talent et la promeut goûteuse personnelle d’une des favorites de l’empereur. Au beau milieu de ce nid de serpents, le moindre faux pas peut lui être fatal!

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.id: Diculik dan dijual ke harem, Maomao berusaha bertahan dengan kemampuannya beradaptasi. Wawasan yang luas tentang obat-obatan membuat karirnya melompat tinggi, langsung menjadi pelayan pribadi selir kesayangan kaisar!
description.it:
Maomao, una giovane farmacista del quartiere a luci rosse della capitale, viene venduta suo malgrado come sguattera alla corte imperiale. Anche se desidera ardentemente tornare libera, si ritrova a non disdegnare la vita tutto sommato comoda che è riuscita a ritagliarsi a palazzo, dove, senza farsi notare, riesce a proseguire i suoi studi di fitoterapia e sulla preparazione dei veleni. Di fronte a un male che affligge i figli dell’imperatore, Maomao sente tuttavia di farsi avanti e, sfruttando le sue conoscenze, riesce a salvare loro la vita. La ragazza attira così le attenzioni del bel eunuco Jinshi, che ha in mente per lei dei piani ben precisi.

---
Giovani donne vengono spesso vendute per lavorare per un breve periodo nell'harem dell'imperatore. È questo il caso di Maomao, farmacista presso il quartiere a luci rosse. Non ha alcun interesse nel farsi notare a palazzo e preferisce starsene per conto suo a preparare medicine, studiare veleni o fare esperimenti su se stessa. Ma quando a corte si diffonde la voce che i figli dell'imperatore sono destinati a una morte prematura, Maomao non riesce a rimanere indifferente. Mentre cerca di indagare, cattura l'attenzione di misterioso e affascinante ufficiale di alto rango. Ha così inizio la sua particolare carriera.
description.ja:
宮中に名探偵誕生!?

「小説家になろう」発! 
ヒーロー文庫の大人気タイトル『薬屋のひとりごと』が、待望のコミカライズ! 
中世の宮中で下働きをする少女・猫猫(マオマオ)。
花街で薬師をやっていた彼女が、帝の御子たちが皆短命であるこという噂を聞いてしまったところから、物語は動き始める。
持ち前の好奇心と知識欲に突き動かされ、興味本位でその原因を調べ始める猫猫の運命は――…!?
「小説家になろう」は株式会社ヒナプロジェクトの登録商標です。
description.pl: Maomao, ambitna młoda zielarka, zostaje porwana i trafia do haremu cesarza jako służąca. Aby nie pogarszać sytuacji, w której się znalazła, zataja swoje umiejętności, a nawet fakt, że potrafi czytać i pisać. Tymczasem nowo narodzone dzieci władcy umierają na skutek tajemniczej klątwy. Zielarka szybko orientuje się, że to nie magia, ale trucizna jest przyczyną śmierci niemowląt. Decyduje się ostrzec księżniczki, podrzucając do ich komnat wiadomość o powodach niezwykłej choroby ich dzieci. Dziewczyna nie przypuszcza nawet, jak bardzo ta decyzja zaważy na jej losie. Tym bardziej, że znalazła się w miejscu, w którym nikt nie może czuć się bezpieczny...
description.ru:
В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?! Адаптация одноимённого ранобэ.  


---

- Won the Grand Prize in the Printed Manga category at the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Award 2019.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekokurage_)  
- [Japanese Light Novel Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/160955/)  
- [Official English Light Novel Translation](https://j-novel.club/s/the-apothecary-diaries/)  
- [Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/tomes-1382-carnets-de-l-apothicaire.html)  
- [Official Chinese (Simplified) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28218)
description.th:
ณ อาณาจักรใหญ่ยักษ์แห่งหนึ่งซึ่งตั้งอยู่ใจกลางทวีป เด็กสาวนางหนึ่งผู้ทำงานเป็นหมอยาในสถานเริงรมย์ย่านโคมแดงอันมีนามว่า ‘เมาเมา’ บัดนี้เกิดจับพลัดจับผลูต้องมาทำงานรับใช้อยู่ในวังหลัง

เธอทำได้เพียงเฝ้ารอให้หมดวาระการทำงานอย่างสงบเสงี่ยมเจียมตัว ด้วยรูปร่างหน้าตาที่ไม่สะสวยจึงมั่นใจเป็นนักหนาว่าตนจะไม่มีวันโดนจักรพรรดิเรียกไปเป็น ‘คู่นอน’ อย่างแน่แท้

แต่ในขณะนั้นเอง โอรสธิดาของจักรพรรดิกลับมีเหตุให้อายุสั้น
พอรู้ว่าสองทารกน้อยที่ยังเหลือรอดกำลังป่วยหนัก เมาเมาจึงลงมือขุดคุ้ยหาสาเหตุ—
description.uk: Ще зовсым юна Мамао досліджує мистецтво лікування травами, мріючи відкрити ліки від усіх недуг. Однак проти своєї волі вона потрапляє в імператорський гарем як служниця. Вона вирішує приховати набуті знання, тому прикидається однією з багатьох неписьменних дівчат. Тим часом діти правителя гинуть за загадкових обставин. Коли весь двір говорить про таємниче прокляття, Маомао розпізнає симптоми отруєння. Але як застерегти зневірених матерів від небезпеки, коли в оточенні імператора голос простого слуги нічого не означає? За воротами Внутрішнього палацу будь-якої миті може статися чергова трагедія. Чи знайде Маомао своє місце в цьому світі, повному інтриг?
description.vi:
Miêu Miêu là một cô gái làm công việc hầu hạ trong cung đình thời phong kiến.
Câu chuyện của chúng ta bắt đầu với việc cô gái từng hành nghề dược sư ở phố hoa này nghe thấy người ta đồn thổi rằng: tất cả những đứa con của Hoàng đế đều đoản mệnh.
Bị thúc đẩy bởi niềm khát khao tri thức và tính hiếu kì cố hữu, Miêu Miêu bắt tay vào tìm hiểu nguyên nhân, xem đó như một cách giải khuây không hơn không kém.
description.zh-hk: 時值中世紀，位處大陸中央的某個大國，有位姑娘名喚貓貓，原本在煙花巷擔任藥師，現在則在後宮當下女。其間，貓貓無意間聽說皇子皆年幼早夭的傳聞，並得知連尚在人世的皇子皇女也身染重病，她於是開始調查其病因──廣獲讚譽的酣暢淋漓推理之作，眾所期盼的第一集終於出版。以中世紀東方為舞臺，「試毒」少女將一一解決宮中發生的懸疑案件！

title.en: The Film Emperor Is Dead Set on Becoming My Backer

description.en: A gold mentalist paparazzi exposes pictures of Lin Chu privately meeting with his sponsor late at night. After getting into a car accident, he entered the body of the center of gossip, Lin Chu. And, his mysterious sponsor is suspected to be the cold and ruthless movie star Li Yu, who doesn't seem to get along with Lin Chu?! What's even more shocking is that it seems Lin Chu... Has more than one sponsor?!

altTitles.ja: カタブツ系女子に告白してみた

altTitles.en: I Tried Confessing My Love to a Serious Girl

altTitles.ja: はじめての星栽

description.ca: Una jove bruixa despistada, prova de cuidar el seu primer planeta, la Terra.
description.en: Oneshot from Harta 32 (March 2016).

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Big Bang Mission!!!

altTitles.ja: スーパードラゴンボール ヒーローズ ビッグバンミッション！！！

description.en: Spin-off manga and the sequel to both Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission! and Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Universe Mission.

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story Of How A Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started To Visit My House After I Helped A Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student’s Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class.

Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...!?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

title.en: Remote Jugyou ni Nattara Class 1 no Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto ni Natta

altTitles.en: When I got to remote class, I had to move in with the most beautiful girl in my class

altTitles.ja: リモート授業になったらクラス1の美少女と同居することになった

description.en:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night.
He was asked by help from Hoshikawa who is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet.
He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!
The sweet and romantic cohabitation love comedy begins with the skilled invitation of the young lady!

title.en: The Person Sitting Next to Me Looking at Me with Perverted Eyes

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の奴がエロい目で見てくる話

altTitles.vi: Người bàn bên thường nhìn tôi bằng ánh mắt biến thái

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Eroi me de Mitekuru Hanashi

altTitles.uk: Людина, що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.ru: Одноклассница, сидящая за соседней партой, смотрит на меня развратным взглядом

altTitles.es-la: La persona de al lado me mira con ojos pervertidos

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/117358783)

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

altTitles.en: Chieri's Love Is 8 Meters Tall

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: ウルトラマン

description.en: The immortal masterpiece "Ultraman" by Daiji Ichimine, a legend in the world of hero comics, is back in a perfect version!! Using plenty of original drawings and magazines newly discovered through research, it has been revised from the previous books. The cover art, which was never published, is also included in its entirety for the first time. Furthermore, the first volume includes a complete color reproduction of the "Monster Neronga Volume" that was not included in the SUNDAY COMICS version, as well as the original prequel to this work, "The Birth of Ultraman Volume", which is included for the first time in a book. This is truly the “final definitive edition”, delivered with the highest specifications ever, which has never been realized even though it has been published many times!! Volumes 1 and 2 will be released simultaneously!! (C) Tsuburaya Productions

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party—

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, the main character, set out to defeat the demon king.
But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.
All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Ms Shizuko, the mother of the hero, sold as a slave—??

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

altTitles.ja: カッコウの許嫁

altTitles.en: A Couple of Cuckoos

altTitles.th: รักอลวนคนสลับบ้าน

description.en: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé! The curtain raises on a romantic comedy of intertwined fates that begins with being switched at birth!
description.es: Una comedia romántica sobre Nagi yendo a una reunión con sus verdaderos padres, y sobre Erika, que está atormentada por un compromiso no deseado!
description.fr: Nagi est un élève sérieux passionné par ses études. Un jour, alors qu'il est en deuxième année, il découvre qu'il a été échangé à la naissance avec une fille. Espérant garder leurs enfants biologiques et adoptifs, leurs parents décident qu'ils vont se fiancer pour pouvoir rester en famille. Mais Nagi est déjà amoureux d'une autre fille...
description.it: Nagi Umino, studente al secondo anno di una prestigiosa scuola preparatoria, ha scoperto di essere un bambino scambiato alla nascita. Un giorno, mentre si sta dirigendo all'incontro con i suoi veri genitori, incontra Erika Amano, una strana ragazza promessa in sposa nonostante la giovane età. Rifiutando di sposarsi, costringe Nagi a far finta di essere il suo ragazzo per cercare di far desistere i genitori dall'idea del matrimonio. Nagi e Erika scopriranno di avere molto più in comune di quanto pensino!
description.ja: 赤ちゃんの頃に取り違えられ、今は名門私立に通う高校 2年の海野凪。ある日、これから許嫁に会いにいくという超お嬢様女子高生・天野エリカと偶然出会い、彼氏のフリをしてくれと半ば強引に頼まれてしまう。だが、その時の二人は知る由もなかった。エリカは凪と取り違えられた子どもで、凪はエリカの許嫁相手だということを……。
description.ru: Романтическая комедия о Наги, идущем на встречу со своими настоящими родителями, и о Эрике, которая мучается из-за нежеланной помолвки!..
description.pt-br: Uma comédia romântica sobre Nagi que está indo se encontrar com seus verdadeiros pais e sobre Erika, que é atormentada por um casamento indesejado!

altTitles.ja: 犬がヒトになる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Inu ga Hito ni Naru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ポン太がヒトになりまして。

description.en:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and it's neighbors where "pet dogs" have become "humans"!
Feelings that couldn't be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly...!?
description.fr: Un jour, les chiens de cette ville sont soudainement devenus humains. L'histoire suit la vie de Saki et de son chien Ponta.
description.ru: В один прекрасный день домашние собаки в этом городе вдруг превращаются в людей. История рассказывает о жизни хозяйки Саки и ее собаки Понты.
description.uk: Одного разу всі собаки, які жили в цьому місті раптово перетворилися на людей. Історія розповідає про життя Сакі, власниці, та Понти, її пса.

title.en: Ore no Nan de Minaide Kudasai！

altTitles.ja: 俺のなんで見ないでください！

altTitles.vi: Đồ Của Tôi, Đừng Có Nhìn!

title.en: I Don't Want to Be a Lady

description.en:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
description.ko:
망나니 황태자의 정부로 팔려가기 전, 공작에게 계약 결혼을 제안했다.

“당신의 부친께서 저와의 혼인을 허락해 주실까요?”
“아니죠. 그러니 방법은 하나뿐이에요.”

“사고를 쳐야죠.”

치한은 머리를 깨줘야 맛.
골목 건달에게는 총알을 박아주고
이웃 나라 황자도 때려눕혔다.


남자가 코웃음 쳤다.

“포로로 잡힌 주제에 건방지기는. 보르네스라면 그 집 개새끼까지 싸가지 없을 것 같단 말이지.”

아리안느가 싱긋 웃으며 말했다.

“우리 집엔 개 안 키워. 이미 주인이 개새끼잖아.”

악녀인 듯 악녀 아닌 악녀 같은 그녀, 아리안느 보르네스의 파란만장 스토리.

altTitles.en: Helck Volundio
Helck: Völundio ~Surreal Sword Saga~

altTitles.ja: 異剣戦記ヴェルンディオ

altTitles.en: Verndio - Surreal Sword Saga
Völundio ~Divergent Sword Saga~

description.en:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
description.ja:
絶望の戦場で…酒場経営はじめます！

傭兵歴10年の男・クレオは
不思議な少女・コハクと出会う。
強大な力を持つ「異剣」が飛び交う
戦場を生き延びるために、
二人が始めたのは――
兵士たちが集う「酒場」の経営！？
description.es-la:
En un campo de batalla desesperado... ¡Empieza a dirigir una taberna!

Cleo, un hombre con 10 años de experiencia como mercenario
Conoce a una misteriosa chica llamada Kohaku.
Para sobrevivir en el campo de batalla donde vuelan las poderosas "otras espadas".
Lo que los dos empiezan a hacer es... Dirigir una "taberna" donde se reúnen los soldados.

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

altTitles.en: Secrets of the Gal Wife

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.vi: Kế Hoạch Tình Yêu Thất Bại Của Mizuki

altTitles.ja: 恋する美月くんの陥落計画
桃源暗鬼

altTitles.en: Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood

description.en: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

altTitles.en: Welcome to the Special Fetish Classroom
Welcome to the Special Idiosyncrasy Classroom

altTitles.ja: 特殊性癖教室へようこそ

altTitles.en: Abnormal Class

description.en: The geniuses and eminent figures that have left their names across history tend to have special fetishes. By taking this anecdotal evidence and turning it around, a class of students with special fetishes was created with the purpose of raising geniuses. Seijun Private Academy class 2-9, also known as the Special Idiosyncrasy Class. White bitch gals, peeping toms, perverted inventors, extreme masochists, exhibitionists…… Itou Manami, a fledgling virgin teacher has been put in charge of this class. Will he be able to fulfill his responsibilities as a teacher against these students and their special interests!?
description.pt-br: Os gênios e as figuras eminentes que deixaram seus nomes ao longo da história tendem a ter fetiches especiais. Pensando nisso foi criada a classe de estudantes com fetiches especiais com o objetivo de criar gênios. Na classe 2-9 da academia privada Seijun, também conhecida como Classe Especial de Idiossincrasia existe pessoas com diferentes fetiches como gyarus , stalkers, pervertidos, masoquistas extremos, exibicionistas… Nesse lugar, Itou Manami, um virgem e professor novato, foi encarregado dessa classe. Ele será capaz de cumprir suas responsabilidades como professor contra esses alunos e seus interesses especiais?

altTitles.ja: しあわせゴハン

description.en:
A man relaxing with a can of beer when a winter storm hits. A man, burdened with personal strife, finds solace in a bowl of ramen. 

A Silent Manga, each chapter is a self-contained glimpse into the life of an ordinary person, and how the meals they eat lift their spirits.

description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

description.en:
Kippei and Ibuki are childhood friends and neighbors who seem to be polar opposites. 
As the seasons change, will their attitude towards each other do too...?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_005483_S?episodeType=comics), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/10293)

title.en: If You Can't Kill Me, Love Me

description.en:
A few years ago, the Second Queen Nayla incited a rebellion. The King and the First Queen, Viatan, along with their aides, were all killed. Only Princess Chell, the daughter of Viatan survived.

The Princess, now lives like a ghost, and is known as the Princess of Death.

Along comes Penny, who becomes Chell's personal maid, making her the first maid that serve the Princess after years. However, she's no ordinary maid.

This blunt and clumsy maid is actually an assassin disguised as a maid. Under the orders of Queen Nayla, Penny's final task is to kill the Princess. 

Penny just wants her freedom. She needs to save money to escape and travel far away after she finishes her final task from Queen Nayla.

Unlike the rumours about being the Princess of Death, Penny finds herself inexplicably drawn to the Princess.

Will Penny be able find her way to freedom?

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.
